error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'sheets_per_ream' (500) was used instead of 'cost_per_ream' (27).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 5000
An office needs to buy 5000/500 = <<5000/500=10>>10 reams of bond paper.
So, it will cost 10 x $500 = $<<10*500=5000>>5000.
